name: C.R.I.M.E.
description:
Game JAM project: 

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-60

Main topic CRIME: Covert robotics internal malformation exercise

Limitation: Pausing

Interpretation explanation: I tried so hard to make the word CRIME an abreviation for testing space distortion.

This is my submission for the game-jam. Sadly my sunday turned out to be completely booked and I couldn't finish my last day of development.

I couldn't check for bugs too much and polish the controls. I only developed 3 levels but I hoped to do more and more difficult ones.

I also planned on writing a short story about how you're testing this drone to perfect teleportation.

If the project somehow ends up reviewed good I'll try to finish it the way I imagined when I have the time.

Extract (2

Start .exe (3
